```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
library(htmlwidgets)
library(webshot2)
library(tinytex)
library(webshot)
webshot::install_phantomjs()
data = read.csv("/Users/orszagl2/Downloads/joined_data.csv")
source('by_sex_scatter.R')
```

Refactor Site Names
```{r}
data$site <- gsub("^Marshfield.*", "Marshfield", data$site)
unique(data$site)
```

Write list of sites to be used
```{r}
items_list = c("KP-Hawaii", "KP-Colorado", "KP-Northwest", "KP-Georgia", "Marshfield", "Sanford Health", "Henry Ford", "University of Chicago")
```

Call by_sex_scatter function for all sites
```{r}
sex_plots(data, items_list)
```

Call by_insurance_sccater for all sites
```{r}
ins_plots(data, items_list)
```
